Bhanu has a {:badgeType} account
Bhanu Pathak
CXO | Consumer-Tech & Marketplace Leader | xto10x | Tata Neu | Founding Team @ Udaan | Flipkart | P&G | J&J
xto10x
Indian Institute of Management, Bangalore
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India Contact info
5,973 followers
500+ connections
Follow
Message
More
About
About
I’m a Senior Operator & Builder across digital commerce, consumer-tech, and early-stage to IPO-scale businesses. Over the past 18 years, I’ve helped category-defining companies — from Flipkart and Udaan to Tata Digital and xto10x — go from zero to high-scale with strong P&L ownership and cross-functional leadership.

At xto10x, I lead Academy Programs that help high-intent startups move from product-market fit to IPO readiness through structured interventions, deep operating work, and international expansion — including xto10x’s entry into Saudi/MENA.

Previously, I was Chief Business Officer at Tata Digital, where I helped scale the Tata Neu super-app across grocery, health, fashion, and jewelry.

As a founding team member at Udaan, I built and led the Food (Staples/FMCG) business from scratch to a $1B+ GMV run rate, and later led innovation in offline retail and quick commerce.

At Flipkart, I spent ~4 years in leadership roles across category, business finance, and supply chain — helping shape the early infrastructure of Indian e-commerce.

I began my career at P&G and J&J, managing large-format trade, launching national shopper marketing programs, and building out the trade marketing function for JJVC India.
…see more

 1 week ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Grateful to have moderated a panel at VIBE Summit yesterday on how and where GenAI is already creating impact in consumer tech.
Thanks to my fellow panelists from() and Tata Digital() for bringing sharp, real-world perspectives.
I had the tough job of going right after— and came away from his talk both impressed and super curious.
Special thanks toat Upekkha for the conversations while putting this together.
was glad to be a knowledge partner for the event.

Looking forward to moderating a conversation on AI in Consumer Tech at VIBE Summit in Bangalore tomorrow at Leela Palace.
A good excuse to step back and ask — what’s actually working, what isn’t, and what might matter next. Do Drop by.
Thanks tofor bringing this together.

General Manager
General Manager
xto10x · Full-time
xto10x · Full-time
Feb 2025 - Present · 6 mos
Feb 2025 to Present · 6 mos
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
At xto10x, we partner with startups on their journey to transform initial business momentum into at-scale impact and world-class organisations.
I lead the design, delivery, and growth of xto10x’s Academy Programs — structured interventions that help high-intent startups scale from PMF to IPO through deep operating work, mentorship, and masterclasses. These programs are now central to xto10x’s India and International scale strategy.
Program Design & Delivery: Own the Lead various Academies for early-stage, growth stage and late stage programs, helping founders unlock growth, org clarity, and public-market readiness.
Global Expansion: Driving xto10x’s entry into Saudi/MENA & Beyond, adapting India’s proven frameworks to local startup ecosystems.
GTM & BD: Lead GTM across VC networks in India and MENA
10x IP Creation: Co-develop frameworks and Thought Leadership Reports for practices (People, Growth, Ops).

Focus: High-intent founders solving trajectory-shifting problems, backed by deep operating support.
E-Commerce, Business Design and +4 skills
CBO - Tata Neu (For Grocery/Health/Fashion/Watches/Jewellery etc)
CBO - Tata Neu (For Grocery/Health/Fashion/Watches/Jewellery etc)
Tata Digital · Full-time
Tata Digital · Full-time
Mar 2022 - Jun 2024 · 2 yrs 4 mos
Mar 2022 to Jun 2024 · 2 yrs 4 mos
On-site
On-site
Led strategy, P&L, and growth for Tata Neu Marketplace categories: grocery, health, fashion, watches etc
Drove 10%+ share of BigBasket, 1mg, and Tata Cliq business through Tata Neu by Q3 2023.
Owned sales, commercial, and product roadmap for Tata brands live on the super app; created AOP plans for new category onboarding.
Launched Tata Neu’s personalization engine, AI-based shopping assistants, and chatbot commercec
Served as cross-functional growth partner across product, tech, and brand teams — aligning legacy Tata brands into a unified commerce engine.
E-Commerce, AI in Retail and +7 skills
Founding Team & CBO - FOOD-FMCG Category
Founding Team & CBO - FOOD-FMCG Category
Udaan.com
Udaan.com
Jan 2017 - Feb 2022 · 5 yrs 2 mos
Jan 2017 to Feb 2022 · 5 yrs 2 mos
Bengaluru Area, India
Bengaluru Area, India
Founding member of Udaan, India’s largest B2B e-commerce platform — led the Food business from pilot to $100M+ monthly GMV and 250K+ kirana customers/month.
Owned end-to-end P&L across staples & FMCG categories; built a multi-city playbook for expansion across 30+ cities.
Achieved early product-market fit in 9 months with 70% customer repeat, $110 AOV, and 40K SKUs — scaling from a 1-city pilot to national footprint.
Developed onboarding and GTM strategies for both long-tail retailers and enterprise sellers/manufacturers, enabling distribution-led growth.
Introduced seller monetization, warehousing, logistics, and embedded credit to improve profitability.
Launched hyperlocal grocery platform ‘Pickily’, scaling to 30–40K daily orders.
Built a high-performance multi-functional team; led transitions to structured BU organization and enabled leadership succession after 5+ years of scale-up.
E-Commerce, Business Design and +5 skills
Flipkart
Flipkart
3 yrs 7 mos
3 yrs 7 mos
Director & Head of Sales- Flipkart Suppy Chain(Ekart)
Director & Head of Sales- Flipkart Suppy Chain(Ekart)
Sep 2015 - Jan 2017 · 1 yr 5 mos
Sep 2015 to Jan 2017 · 1 yr 5 mos
Built a new business line from scratch that contributed to 12% of Ekart’s total revenue, with services spanning B2B, B2C, and C2C logistics.
Led a cross-functional growth pod (Product, Ops, Tech, Finance, Design) to launch and scale monetizable service offerings.
Designed and launched new external logistics services in partnership with Product; scaled the unit to 10%+ of total revenue in under 12 months.
Spearheaded the “servicification” of internal capabilities into client-facing logistics products, driving Flipkart's push into external revenue streams.
E-Commerce and Business Design
Business Finance & Strategy - SCM
Business Finance & Strategy - SCM
Mar 2014 - Aug 2015 · 1 yr 6 mos
Mar 2014 to Aug 2015 · 1 yr 6 mos
Bangalore
Bangalore
Headed Business Finance & Strategy for Flipkart’s supply chain across fulfilment, long-haul, and line haul — partnering with BU heads to scale infrastructure for hypergrowth.
Owned AOP and 3–5 year network design to align Capex/Opex planning with expansion goals.
Anchored key strategic programs in automation, cost optimization, and service blueprinting (e.g., Same-Day Delivery, Hyperlocal).
Delivered 13% cost reduction and 9% EBIT improvement while enabling capacity expansion across 16+ warehouses.
E-Commerce and Business Design
Category Leader In Flipkart
Category Leader In Flipkart
Jul 2013 - Feb 2014 · 8 mos
Jul 2013 to Feb 2014 · 8 mos
Bangalore
Bangalore
Owned P&L for one of Flipkart’s top 5 categories, delivering 300% YoY growth while expanding buy-sell margins by 4%.
Led end-to-end category management including selection strategy, inventory planning, pricing, and merchandising.
Forged Flipkart’s first Joint Business Plans (JBPs) with global brands like Sony and Canon, enabling exclusive launches and deeper strategic alignment.
Played a key role in making Camera & AV the #3 GMV driver during Flipkart’s 2013 Diwali season.
E-Commerce, Product Marketing and +3 skills
Brand & Trade Marketing Manager

Johnson & Johnson

Gurgaon
Gurgaon
Led Trade Marketing for Acuvue India, managing a four-person team and overseeing brand growth, shopper marketing, and new user acquisition across digital and retail.
Piloted India’s first multi-city IMC campaign, launched loyalty programs, and drove new user trials via an e-trial program that generated 65K+ leads with 11% conversion.
Received two Global Encore Awards for brand activations and planning excellence.
Extensive experience in Brand Activation, Agency Handling, Social Media.
